markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shattering Strike (Monk)](/Feats.aspx?ID=482) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 165 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The force of your considered blow shatters objects and defenses alike. Make an unarmed Strike. It bypasses the target’s resistances. If the target has Hardness, the Strike treats the Hardness as if it were half its value.
name: Shattering Strike (Monk)
